1. Total annual carbon emissions, carbon emissions per storage capacity shipped, 
and water metrics are measured and reported based on the calendar year. The 
values provided in this table are for calendar years 2016, 2017 and 2018. Other 
numbers in the table, for ethics, health and safety, and our employees are all 
reported in FY. 
2. All 15 Scope 3 categories were assessed, and 12 of 15 were found relevant.
